mapper.sql: ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_ DESCRIBE, GOODS_SPECIFICATION
mapper.select: select DISTINCT t.GOODS_TYPE FROM SYS_MATERIAL t
select DISTINCT t.GOODS_NAME FROM SYS_MATERIAL t
select DISTINCT t.GOODS_SPECIFICATION FROM SYS_MATERIAL t
mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_MATERIAL
ID,
GOODS_NAME,
GOODS_TYPE,
GOODS_DESCRIBE,
GOODS_SPECIFICATION,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select * from SYS_MATERIAL t where t.GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from SYS_MATERIAL t where t.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update SYS_MATERIAL
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_DESCRIBE = #{goodsDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_SPECIFICATION = #{goodsSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
